title: Rollback to last stable Binance-only build and remove CoinGecko entirely

requirements.text: Completely remove any CoinGecko dependency from the project and restore the application to the last stable Binance-only behavior. This includes removing all CoinGecko-related code paths (services, hooks, utilities, fallbacks), configuration (env vars, constants), and any UI behavior that relies on CoinGecko, so the app runs using only Binance (WebSocket + REST fallback) and existing synthetic fallbacks.

quotes: remover o CoinGecko, reverter exatamente para o estado anterior estável
Sim.. a ultima versão binance. Exatamente neste ponto.
iniciar agora o rollback/build completo para a última versão estável Binance‑only

acceptanceCriteria: The codebase contains no runtime calls to CoinGecko endpoints and no CoinGecko-specific services/hooks are used anywhere in the frontend.
Any CoinGecko-related configuration variables are removed from the app runtime/config and are not required to run or build the project.
All dashboards/modules load successfully and continue to display live market data using Binance-only sources (WebSocket + REST fallback) and existing synthetic data behavior where applicable.
No user-facing UI text mentions CoinGecko; any user-facing text introduced/updated by this change is in English.

requirements.text: Publish the resulting Binance-only rollback as the new stable baseline of the project (i.e., the default behavior and code path going forward), with CoinGecko fully removed and not left as dead code.

quotes: publicar imediatamente essa versão como a nova base estável

acceptanceCriteria: There is no optional/hidden switch that re-enables CoinGecko; the application operates as Binance-only by default.
The application builds successfully without any CoinGecko-related modules, imports, or config.

constraints: Respect the single-actor backend architecture; keep all Motoko logic in backend/main.mo.

Do not edit files under frontend/immutablePaths (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui). Compose or wrap instead.
Use English for any user-facing text introduced or modified as part of this build request.
nonGoals: Do not add new third-party market data providers (only Binance should remain).
Do not introduce new backend services, databases, or external infrastructure beyond the existing Internet Computer canister.
